content: **crocheted jumper in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with round yoke and lace pattern sizes xs - xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-469 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 651 sand **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 12 row in height = 10 cm x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
